div.p: The code for the language used in the EAS instance or by the records or entity being described.

Content of the attribute should be a code taken from ISO 639-1, ISO 639-2b, ISO 639-3, IETF BCP 47 or another controlled list, as specified in the languageEncoding attribute in control. Required in languageDeclaration and optionally available in language.
